t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    ap = 0
    bp = 0
    for i in range(n):
        line = input()
        words = line.split()
        nums = [int(w) for w in words]
        (a, b) = nums
        a_string = str(a)
        b_string = str(b)
        a_digit = [int(a_s) for a_s in a_string]
        b_digit = [int(b_s) for b_s in b_string]
        ad = sum(a_digit)
        bd = sum(b_digit)
        if ad > bd:
            ap += 1
        elif ad < bd:
            bp += 1
        else:
            ap += 1
            bp += 1
    if ap > bp:
        print(0, ap)
    elif ap < bp:
        print(1, bp)
    else:
        print(2, ap)
